World's Leading Industry Corporation!

Best A Grade Commercial
& Residential Services

Stronger Projects Than Ever!!

item.content:encoded:
Best A Grade Commercial
& Residential Services

Building bigger, better, faster & stronger products than ever before. We can
help you build on your past and prepare for future. Request A Quote The Best A Grade Commercial & Residential Services

High Quality Construction Solutions
For Residentials & Industries!

Architecture & Building

Materials science principles to design, analyze, manufacture & maintain mechanical systems. It is one… Cognitive architectureComputer architectureEnterprise architecture Read more

Construction Consultants

Construction engineering is a professional discipline deals with designing, planning, construction of infrastructures such… Construction managerConsulting engineerContract administrator Read more

Construction Management

Petroleum and gas are nonrenewable sources of energy. Petroleum is a liquid mixture found… Design-build contractsDesign, bid, build contractsPlanning and scheduling Read more Numbers Speak For Themselves.

Building Relationships With
Clients All Over The World!

1 Projects And Residentials
Completed in 2019 1 Qualified Employees And
Workers With Us 1 Satisfied Clients We Have
Served Globally 0, 1 Years Of Experience In The
Construction Industry

Request A Quote

Complete control over products allows us to ensure our customers receive the best quality prices and service. We take great pride in everything that we do in our factory.

We will get back to you, or call us everyday, 09:00 AM - 12:00 PM 55 654 541 17
I accept the privacy and terms.

Leading The Way In Building And Civil Construction

Ready to Bring Bigger, Better,
Faster And Stronger Projects
Than Ever Before!!

Mike Dooley

Chief Executive

Michael Brian

Managing Director

Chris Wensel

Vice President

Richard Muldoone

Legal Officer

Maria Andaloro

HR Officer

Marian Chris

Global Sales

Jack Mudson

Manager

item.title: Careers
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Company Careers

  • Home
Work With Us!

Building Relationships With Clients
All Over The World!

Full Time New York

Chief Executive Officer

A chief executive officer (CEO) is the highest-ranking executive in a company, and their primary responsibilities include making major corporate decisions. Read More Full Time Latin America

Chief Financial Officer

A chief executive officer (CEO) is the highest-ranking executive in a company, and their primary responsibilities include making major corporate decisions. Read More Part Time San Francisco

Global Sales & Marketing

A chief executive officer (CEO) is the highest-ranking executive in a company, and their primary responsibilities include making major corporate decisions. Read More Full Time New York

Environmental Sensitivity

A chief executive officer (CEO) is the highest-ranking executive in a company, and their primary responsibilities include making major corporate decisions. Read More World's Leading Industry Corporation!

Best A Grade Commercial
& Residential Services

The world is changing faster than ever before, business is no exception, yet those that embrace change are thriving, building bigger, better, faster & stronger products than ever before. We can help you build on your past and prepare for future.
Powerfull Product
Strategy

Our facilities meet high security requirements and are certified to the highest local standards.

Award Winning
Projects

The world of international supply chains involves of unknown risks and challenging regulations.

Watch
Our Video!

1 Projects And Residentials
Completed in 2019 1 Qualified Employees And
Workers With Us 1 Satisfied Clients We Have
Served Globally 0, 1 Years Of Experience In The Construction Industry

item.title: The new Driver Training & Recruitment Program
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The key to the success of any logistics contract is good logistics management. The key to good management is the ability to identify the needs of the client and the countries in which the work will take place, as well as being in a position to advise the best way forward. In todays international and remote locations, experience and understanding of logistics operations and local networks is vital. With the many years of experience in our team, we have a detailed understanding of the criticality or every aspect of the logistics world.
Focus can provide logistics personnel to meet the needs of your company or project. From logistics managers to warehousemen, logistics controllers to transport coordinators, we can assist you. We provide personnel for one-off projects as well as long or short-term agency personnel, assist in the recruitment of permanent staff, or we can manage your logistics department for you.
When travelling to a foreign country, most people are nervous of the obstacles that will be there for them to overcome. When a full marine crew travels en-mass to a vessel mobilisation, it is imperative that they arrive on time and safely, especially in a remote location.
Focus provides meet-and-greet facilities through our network of specialist companies. From hotel reservations and taxi arrangements to a full pick-up facility, with or without armed guards, this can be arranged.
Ever had a last minute requirement for items to be in a country where you do not have a visa to enter? Are you frustrated at having to hand-carry important documents to your client, which takes you out of the office for days? Let Focus help you. Our personnel are available 24-hours-a-day for these important deliveries. This leaves you free to concentrate on your business.
item.excerpt:encoded: If you know of anyone looking for a bigger opportunity, a fresh start, or just something different, please have them contact our operations team now...

item.title: Request Quote
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
A Grade Commercial
& Residential Services

A leading developer of A-grade commercial, industrial and residential projects in USA. Since its foundation the company has doubled its turnover year on year with its staff.

Latest Projects
Powerfull Product
Strategy

Our facilities meet high security requirements and are certified to the highest local standards.

Award Winning
Projects

The world of international supply chains involves of unknown risks and challenging regulations.

100% Satisfaction
Guarantee

Building relationships and projects that last. Serving an impressive list of long-term clients.

Quality Control
System

Promina Group is recognized as one of the World's leading Industry and Manufacturing Corporation!

Leading The Way In Building And Civil Construction

Ready to Bring Bigger, Better, Faster And Stronger Projects Than Ever Before!!

  • Quality Control System, 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
  • Highly Professional Staff, Accurate Testing Processes
  • Unrivalled workmanship, Professional and Qualified

Utilising latest processing solutions, and decades of work experience.

Designing, construction, planning & infrastructures management such.

Our Location
2307 Beverley Rd Brooklyn, New York 11226 United States.
Quick Contact
Email:Promin@7oroof.com
Support: Promin@7oroof.com We will get back to you within
24 hours, or call us everyday,
09:00 AM - 12:00 PM 55 654 541 17

Request A Quote

Complete control over products allows us to ensure our customers receive the best quality prices and service.


I accept the privacy and terms.

What Our Clients Say!

John Peter

7oroof

Sami Wade

7oroof

Martin Hope

Trustry

They are the best and expertly trained team members who take the extra step and go the extra mile, all to fulfill our promise to deliver innovative and dynamic solutions to our customers to fit the needs of a rapidly changing global environment.

Designing, construction, planning & infrastructures management such.

Utilising latest processing solutions, and decades of work experience.

Leading The Way In Building And Civil Construction

Bigger, Better, Faster And
Stronger Projects Than Ever!!

Yet those that embrace change are thriving, building bigger, better, faster, and stronger products than ever before. You are helping to lead the charge; we can help you build on your prepare future.

The world is changing faster than ever before, Promina industries are threatened as technology disrupts and software.

  • Quality Control System
  • 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
  • Highly Professional Staff

  • Accurate Testing Processes
  • Professional and Qualified

High Quality Construction Solutions
For Residentials & Industries!

Architecture & Building

Construction Consultants

Construction Management

Professional service uses specialized, project management techniques to oversee the planning, design. Design-build contractsDesign, bid, build contractsPlanning and scheduling Read more Numbers Speak For Themselves.

Building Relationships With
Clients All Over The World!

4154 Projects And Residentials
Completed in 2019 1512 Qualified Employees And
Workers With Us 1084 Satisfied Clients We Have
Served Globally 0, 10 Years Of Experience In The
Construction Industry

Request A Quote

Complete control over products allows us to ensure our customers receive the best quality prices and service. We take great pride in everything that we do in our factory.

item.title: Main Contact Form
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[text* your-name placeholder "Name"]
[email* your-email placeholder "Email"]
[text* your-phone placeholder "Phone"]
[select your-industry "Select Your Industry" "Petroleum & Gas Energy" "Construction & Engineering" "Mechanical Engineering"]
[textarea* your-message placeholder "Additional Details!"]
[checkbox* your-privacy class:theme-checkbox "I accept the privacy and terms."]
1 Promina "[your-subject]" Promina admin@gmail.com From: [your-name] <[your-email]> Subject: [your-subject] Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Promina Reply-To: [your-email] Axima "[your-subject]" Axima [your-email] Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Axima (https://demo.cmssuperheroes.com/themeforest/koira) Reply-To: admin@gmail.com Thank you for your message. It has been sent. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. One or more fields have an error. Please check and try again. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. You must accept the terms and conditions before sending your message. The field is required. The field is too long. The field is too short. The date format is incorrect. The date is before the earliest one allowed. The date is after the latest one allowed. There was an unknown error uploading the file. You are not allowed to upload files of this type. The file is too big. There was an error uploading the file. The number format is invalid. The number is smaller than the minimum allowed. The number is larger than the maximum allowed. The answer to the quiz is incorrect. The e-mail address entered is invalid. The URL is invalid. The telephone number is invalid.

item.title: Importers achieve cost savings through the First Sale rule!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The key to the success of any logistics contract is good logistics management. The key to good management is the ability to identify the needs of the client and the countries in which the work will take place, as well as being in a position to advise the best way forward. In todays international and remote locations, experience and understanding of logistics operations and local networks is vital. With the many years of experience in our team, we have a detailed understanding of the criticality or every aspect of the logistics world.
Focus can provide logistics personnel to meet the needs of your company or project. From logistics managers to warehousemen, logistics controllers to transport coordinators, we can assist you. We provide personnel for one-off projects as well as long or short-term agency personnel, assist in the recruitment of permanent staff, or we can manage your logistics department for you.
When travelling to a foreign country, most people are nervous of the obstacles that will be there for them to overcome. When a full marine crew travels en-mass to a vessel mobilisation, it is imperative that they arrive on time and safely, especially in a remote location.
Focus provides meet-and-greet facilities through our network of specialist companies. From hotel reservations and taxi arrangements to a full pick-up facility, with or without armed guards, this can be arranged.
Ever had a last minute requirement for items to be in a country where you do not have a visa to enter? Are you frustrated at having to hand-carry important documents to your client, which takes you out of the office for days? Let Focus help you. Our personnel are available 24-hours-a-day for these important deliveries. This leaves you free to concentrate on your business.

item.content:encoded:
Design Build Contracts

Dedicated Customer Teams & Agile Services

Today Promin has over 4,000 professionals on its payroll All Over The World. Get A Quote

Download

Company Report 2019 PDF Company Brochure PDF

A leading developer of A grade commercial, industrial and residential projects in USA. Since foundation we doubled turnover year on year, with its staff numbers swelling accordingly.

The Fallingwater House

Architecture, Interior

The Center House

Building, Construction

Sagrada Familia

Building, Construction

Neue National Galerie

Building, Interior More Projects

Overview

Our airfreight staff attaches great importance to customizing the booking process for our customers. Thats why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. Well ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if theres potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct.  
Powerfull Product Strategy
Our facilities meet high security requirements and are certified to the highest local standards.  
Award Winning Projects
The world of international supply chains involves of unknown risks and challenging regulations.  
100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Building relationships and projects that last. Serving an impressive list of long-term clients.

Key Benifits

Which Plan Is Right For Me? With any financial product that you buy, it is important that you know you are getting the best advice from a reputable company as often you will have to provide sensitive information online or over the internet. Do I have to commit to a contract? item.title: Planning And Scheduling
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Planning And Scheduling

Dedicated Customer Teams & Agile Services

Today Promin has over 4,000 professionals on its payroll All Over The World. Get A Quote

Download

Company Report 2019 PDF Company Brochure PDF

A leading developer of A grade commercial, industrial and residential projects in USA. Since foundation we doubled turnover year on year, with its staff numbers swelling accordingly.

The Fallingwater House

Architecture, Interior

The Center House

Building, Construction

Sagrada Familia

Building, Construction

Neue National Galerie

Building, Interior More Projects

Overview

Our airfreight staff attaches great importance to customizing the booking process for our customers. Thats why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. Well ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if theres potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct.  
Powerfull Product Strategy
Our facilities meet high security requirements and are certified to the highest local standards.  
Award Winning Projects
The world of international supply chains involves of unknown risks and challenging regulations.  
100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Building relationships and projects that last. Serving an impressive list of long-term clients.

Key Benifits

Which Plan Is Right For Me? With any financial product that you buy, it is important that you know you are getting the best advice from a reputable company as often you will have to provide sensitive information online or over the internet. Do I have to commit to a contract? With any financial product that you buy, it is important that you know you are getting the best advice from a reputable company as often you will have to provide sensitive information online or over the internet. What Payment Methods Are Available? With any financial product that you buy, it is important that you know you are getting the best advice from a reputable company as often you will have to provide sensitive information online or over the internet.

How It Works?!

Watch Our Video!
item.excerpt:encoded: Planning involves identification of a task or tasks that need to occur. Scheduling involves assigning the future action.

Architecture

A leading developer of A grade commercial, industrial and residential projects in USA. Since foundation we doubled turnover year on year, with its staff numbers swelling accordingly.

The Fallingwater House

Architecture, Interior

The Center House

Building, Construction

Building, Interior More Projects

Overview

Our airfreight staff attaches great importance to customizing the booking process for our customers. Thats why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. Well ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if theres potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct.

Powerfull Product
Strategy

Our facilities meet high security requirements and are certified to the highest local standards.

Award Winning
Projects

The world of international supply chains involves of unknown risks and challenging regulations.

100% Satisfaction
Guarantee

Building relationships and projects that last. Serving an impressive list of long-term clients.

Key Benifits

Our airfreight staff attaches great importance to customizing the booking process for our customers. Thats why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. item.content:encoded:
Construction
Management

Dedicated Customer Teams & Agile Services

Today Promin has over 4,000 professionals on its payroll All Over The World. Get A Quote

Download

Company Report 2019 PDF Company Brochure PDF

A leading developer of A grade commercial, industrial and residential projects in USA. Since foundation we doubled turnover year on year, with its staff numbers swelling accordingly.

The Fallingwater House

Architecture, Interior

The Center House

Building, Construction

Sagrada Familia

Building, Construction

Neue National Galerie

Building, Interior More Projects

Overview

Our airfreight staff attaches great importance to customizing the booking process for our customers. Thats why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. Well ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if theres potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct.

Powerfull Product
Strategy

Our facilities meet high security requirements and are certified to the highest local standards.

Award Winning
Projects

The world of international supply chains involves of unknown risks and challenging regulations.

100% Satisfaction
Guarantee

Building relationships and projects that last. Serving an impressive list of long-term clients.

Key Benifits

A leading developer of A grade commercial, industrial and residential projects in USA. Since foundation we doubled turnover year on year, with its staff numbers swelling accordingly.

Powerfull Product
Strategy

Our facilities meet high security requirements and are certified to the highest local standards.

100% Satisfaction
Guarantee

Quality Control
System

Promina Group is recognized as one of the World's leading Industry and Manufacturing Corporation!

Overview

Our airfreight staff attaches great importance to customizing the booking process for our customers. Thats why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. Well ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if theres potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct.

We have more than twenty years of experience. During that time, weve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world.

Location: Tanta, Algharbia, Egypt
Services: : Construction, Architecture, Building, Renovations

Have A Project, Request A Quote

During that time, weve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world.

item.title: The Fallingwater House
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
A leading developer of A grade commercial, industrial and residential projects in USA. Since foundation we doubled turnover year on year, with its staff numbers swelling accordingly.

Powerfull Product
Strategy

Our facilities meet high security requirements and are certified to the highest local standards.

100% Satisfaction
Guarantee

Building relationships and projects that last. Serving an impressive list of long-term clients.

Quality Control
System

Promina Group is recognized as one of the World's leading Industry and Manufacturing Corporation!

Overview

Our airfreight staff attaches great importance to customizing the booking process for our customers. Thats why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. Well ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if theres potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct.

We have more than twenty years of experience. During that time, weve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world.

Client: 7oroof Network
Location: Tanta, Algharbia, Egypt
Services: : Construction, Architecture, Building, Renovations

Have A Project, Request A Quote

Challenge

However, the scope of Dows needs had only been accomplished on an inter-regional scale. What Dow wanted now was seamless information management and transportation logistics.Thats why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. Well ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if theres potential to save on time or cost.

During that time, weve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world.

  • Design, bid, build contracts
  • Planning and scheduling
  • Design-build contracts
  • Construction manager
  • Contract administrator
  • Consulting engineer

Solution &
Results

Thats why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. Well ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if theres potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct.

During that time, weve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world.

1 Projects Completed 1 Qualified Workers 1 Satisfied Clients

What Our Clients Say!

John Peter

7oroof

Sami Wade

7oroof

Martin Hope

Trustry

They are the best and expertly trained team members who take the extra step and go the extra mile, all to fulfill our promise to deliver innovative and dynamic solutions to our customers to fit the needs of a rapidly changing global environment.

All to fulfill our promise to deliver innovative and dynamic solutions to our customers to fit the needs of a rapidly changing global environment. They are the best and expertly trained team members who take the extra step and go the extra mile.

The best of the best, and expertly trained team members who take the extra step and go the extra mile, all to fulfill our dedicated promise to deliver innovative and dynamic solutions to our customers to fit the needs of a which was perfect for our needs!!

item.title: Guggenheim Museum
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
A leading developer of A grade commercial, industrial and residential projects in USA. Since foundation we doubled turnover year on year, with its staff numbers swelling accordingly.

Powerfull Product
Strategy

Our facilities meet high security requirements and are certified to the highest local standards.

100% Satisfaction
Guarantee

Building relationships and projects that last. Serving an impressive list of long-term clients.

Quality Control
System

Promina Group is recognized as one of the World's leading Industry and Manufacturing Corporation!

Overview

Our airfreight staff attaches great importance to customizing the booking process for our customers. Thats why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. Well ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if theres potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct.

We have more than twenty years of experience. During that time, weve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world.

Client: 7oroof Network
Location: Tanta, Algharbia, Egypt
Services: : Construction, Architecture, Building, Renovations

Have A Project, Request A Quote

Challenge

However, the scope of Dows needs had only been accomplished on an inter-regional scale. What Dow wanted now was seamless information management and transportation logistics.Thats why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. Well ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if theres potential to save on time or cost.

During that time, weve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world.

  • Design, bid, build contracts
  • Planning and scheduling
  • Design-build contracts
  • Construction manager
  • Contract administrator
  • Consulting engineer

Solution &
Results

Thats why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. Well ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if theres potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct.

During that time, weve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world.

1 Projects Completed 1 Qualified Workers 1 Satisfied Clients

What Our Clients Say!

John Peter

7oroof

Sami Wade

7oroof

Martin Hope

Trustry

They are the best and expertly trained team members who take the extra step and go the extra mile, all to fulfill our promise to deliver innovative and dynamic solutions to our customers to fit the needs of a rapidly changing global environment.

All to fulfill our promise to deliver innovative and dynamic solutions to our customers to fit the needs of a rapidly changing global environment. They are the best and expertly trained team members who take the extra step and go the extra mile.

The best of the best, and expertly trained team members who take the extra step and go the extra mile, all to fulfill our dedicated promise to deliver innovative and dynamic solutions to our customers to fit the needs of a which was perfect for our needs!!

item.title: Neue National Galerie
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
A leading developer of A grade commercial, industrial and residential projects in USA. Since foundation we doubled turnover year on year, with its staff numbers swelling accordingly.

Powerfull Product
Strategy

Our facilities meet high security requirements and are certified to the highest local standards.

100% Satisfaction
Guarantee

Building relationships and projects that last. Serving an impressive list of long-term clients.

Quality Control
System

Promina Group is recognized as one of the World's leading Industry and Manufacturing Corporation!

Overview

Our airfreight staff attaches great importance to customizing the booking process for our customers. Thats why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. Well ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if theres potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct.

We have more than twenty years of experience. During that time, weve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world.

Client: 7oroof Network
Location: Tanta, Algharbia, Egypt
Services: : Construction, Architecture, Building, Renovations

Have A Project, Request A Quote

Challenge

However, the scope of Dows needs had only been accomplished on an inter-regional scale. What Dow wanted now was seamless information management and transportation logistics.Thats why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. Well ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if theres potential to save on time or cost.

During that time, weve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world.

  • Design, bid, build contracts
  • Planning and scheduling
  • Design-build contracts
  • Construction manager
  • Contract administrator
  • Consulting engineer

Solution &
Results

Thats why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. Well ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if theres potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct.

During that time, weve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world.

1 Projects Completed 1 Qualified Workers 1 Satisfied Clients

What Our Clients Say!

John Peter

7oroof

Sami Wade

7oroof

Martin Hope

Trustry

They are the best and expertly trained team members who take the extra step and go the extra mile, all to fulfill our promise to deliver innovative and dynamic solutions to our customers to fit the needs of a rapidly changing global environment.

All to fulfill our promise to deliver innovative and dynamic solutions to our customers to fit the needs of a rapidly changing global environment. They are the best and expertly trained team members who take the extra step and go the extra mile.

The best of the best, and expertly trained team members who take the extra step and go the extra mile, all to fulfill our dedicated promise to deliver innovative and dynamic solutions to our customers to fit the needs of a which was perfect for our needs!!

item.title: Heydar Aliyev Center
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
A leading developer of A grade commercial, industrial and residential projects in USA. Since foundation we doubled turnover year on year, with its staff numbers swelling accordingly.

Powerfull Product
Strategy

Our facilities meet high security requirements and are certified to the highest local standards.

100% Satisfaction
Guarantee

Building relationships and projects that last. Serving an impressive list of long-term clients.

Quality Control
System

Promina Group is recognized as one of the World's leading Industry and Manufacturing Corporation!

Overview

Our airfreight staff attaches great importance to customizing the booking process for our customers. Thats why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. Well ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if theres potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct.

We have more than twenty years of experience. During that time, weve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world.

Client: 7oroof Network
Location: Tanta, Algharbia, Egypt
Services: : Construction, Architecture, Building, Renovations

Have A Project, Request A Quote

Challenge

However, the scope of Dows needs had only been accomplished on an inter-regional scale. What Dow wanted now was seamless information management and transportation logistics.Thats why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. Well ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if theres potential to save on time or cost.

During that time, weve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world.

  • Design, bid, build contracts
  • Planning and scheduling
  • Design-build contracts
  • Construction manager
  • Contract administrator
  • Consulting engineer

Solution &
Results

Thats why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. Well ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if theres potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct.

During that time, weve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world.

1 Projects Completed 1 Qualified Workers 1 Satisfied Clients

What Our Clients Say!

John Peter

7oroof

Sami Wade

7oroof

Martin Hope

Trustry

They are the best and expertly trained team members who take the extra step and go the extra mile, all to fulfill our promise to deliver innovative and dynamic solutions to our customers to fit the needs of a rapidly changing global environment.

All to fulfill our promise to deliver innovative and dynamic solutions to our customers to fit the needs of a rapidly changing global environment. They are the best and expertly trained team members who take the extra step and go the extra mile.

The best of the best, and expertly trained team members who take the extra step and go the extra mile, all to fulfill our dedicated promise to deliver innovative and dynamic solutions to our customers to fit the needs of a which was perfect for our needs!!

item.title: Cathedral of Brasilia
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
A leading developer of A grade commercial, industrial and residential projects in USA. Since foundation we doubled turnover year on year, with its staff numbers swelling accordingly.

Powerfull Product
Strategy

Our facilities meet high security requirements and are certified to the highest local standards.

100% Satisfaction
Guarantee

Building relationships and projects that last. Serving an impressive list of long-term clients.

Quality Control
System

Promina Group is recognized as one of the World's leading Industry and Manufacturing Corporation!

Overview

Our airfreight staff attaches great importance to customizing the booking process for our customers. Thats why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. Well ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if theres potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct.

We have more than twenty years of experience. During that time, weve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world.

Client: 7oroof Network
Location: Tanta, Algharbia, Egypt
Services: : Construction, Architecture, Building, Renovations

Have A Project, Request A Quote

Challenge

However, the scope of Dows needs had only been accomplished on an inter-regional scale. What Dow wanted now was seamless information management and transportation logistics.Thats why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. Well ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if theres potential to save on time or cost.

During that time, weve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world.

  • Design, bid, build contracts
  • Planning and scheduling
  • Design-build contracts
  • Construction manager
  • Contract administrator
  • Consulting engineer

Solution &
Results

Thats why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. Well ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if theres potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct.

During that time, weve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world.

1 Projects Completed 1 Qualified Workers 1 Satisfied Clients

What Our Clients Say!

John Peter

7oroof

Sami Wade

7oroof

Martin Hope

Trustry

They are the best and expertly trained team members who take the extra step and go the extra mile, all to fulfill our promise to deliver innovative and dynamic solutions to our customers to fit the needs of a rapidly changing global environment.

All to fulfill our promise to deliver innovative and dynamic solutions to our customers to fit the needs of a rapidly changing global environment. They are the best and expertly trained team members who take the extra step and go the extra mile.

The best of the best, and expertly trained team members who take the extra step and go the extra mile, all to fulfill our dedicated promise to deliver innovative and dynamic solutions to our customers to fit the needs of a which was perfect for our needs!!

item.title: The Center House
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
A leading developer of A grade commercial, industrial and residential projects in USA. Since foundation we doubled turnover year on year, with its staff numbers swelling accordingly.  

Powerfull Product Strategy

Our facilities meet high security requirements and are certified to the highest local standards.

100% Satisfaction Guarantee

Building relationships and projects that last. Serving an impressive list of long-term clients.

Quality Control System

Promina Group is recognized as one of the World's leading Industry and Manufacturing Corporation!

Overview

Our airfreight staff attaches great importance to customizing the booking process for our customers. Thats why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. Well ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if theres potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct. We have more than twenty years of experience. During that time, weve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world. Client: 7oroof Network Location: Tanta, Algharbia, Egypt Services: : Construction, Architecture, Building, Renovations Have A Project, Request A Quote

Challenge

However, the scope of Dows needs had only been accomplished on an inter-regional scale. What Dow wanted now was seamless information management and transportation logistics.Thats why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. Well ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if theres potential to save on time or cost. During that time, weve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world.
  • Design, bid, build contracts
  • Planning and scheduling
  • Design-build contracts
  • Construction manager
  • Contract administrator
  • Consulting engineer

Solution & Results

Thats why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. Well ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if theres potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct. During that time, weve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world. 1 Projects Completed 1 Qualified Workers 1 Satisfied Clients What Our Clients Say!
John Peter
7oroof
Sami Wade
7oroof
Martin Hope
Trustry They are the best and expertly trained team members who take the extra step and go the extra mile, all to fulfill our promise to deliver innovative and dynamic solutions to our customers to fit the needs of a rapidly changing global environment. All to fulfill our promise to deliver innovative and dynamic solutions to our customers to fit the needs of a rapidly changing global environment. They are the best and expertly trained team members who take the extra step and go the extra mile. The best of the best, and expertly trained team members who take the extra step and go the extra mile, all to fulfill our dedicated promise to deliver innovative and dynamic solutions to our customers to fit the needs of a which was perfect for our needs!!
